area_1_x.desc: To Check if the units are in the selected area

comparison.desc: The type of comparison to perfom, less than, greater than, less than or equal to, greater than or equal to, equal to, not equal to

inverted.desc: If this is selected, then the condition behaves the opposite. That is, when it should be true, it becomes false, when its false, it becomes true

next_object.desc: The unit to bring the first unit to

object_group.desc: The group/category of units to affect TODO

object_list.desc: The kind of unit to check for in the condition

object_type.desc: This is the class of the units to check for

resource_type_or_tribute_list.desc: The type of resource to check for
The type of resource to check for

source_player.desc: The player to check the condition for

target_player.desc: The second player to check the condition for

technology.desc: The technology to check the condition for

timer.desc: The amount in seconds to wait before the condition is true

unit_object.desc: The object to check the condition for

variable.desc: The variable to check the condition fors

object_state.desc: The state that the object must be in
